onboarding_1.title: Stuur, ontvang & bestuur jou IOTA
onboarding_1.body: Firefly is ń veilig en maklik-om-te-gebruik IOTA beursie.

legal.checkbox: I have read and I accept the Privacy policy & ToS

language.title: Taal en voorkoms
language.body: Kies jou beursie se taal en tema

setup.title: Stel jou beursie op
setup.body: Jy kan 'n nuwe beursie skep of 'n bestaande beursie invoer.

password.title: Skep 'n wagwoord
password.body: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body_1: Set up a login PIN to make sure that only you can enter your wallet.

pin.title: Stel PIN-kode op
pin.body_1: Tik 'n 6-syfer PIN hieronder. Jy sal gevra word om jou PIN in te voer om aan te meld by jou beursie.

confirm_pin.title: Verifieer jou PIN-kode
confirm_pin.body: Voer weer jou PIN-kode in om voort te gaan.

backup.title: Back-up you beursie
backup.body_1: Jy sal nou vertoon word met 'n herstel frase.
backup.body_2: Moenie hierdie frase met iemand deel nie. Jou herstelfrase kan gebruik word om toegang tot jou tokens te kry.
backup.body_3: As jy jou herstelfrase verloor, kan jy jou geld verloor.

recovery_phrase.title: Herstel frase
recovery_phrase.body_1: Skryf die woorde noukeurig neer in die presiese volgorde.
recovery_phrase.body_2: Stoor you herstelfrase privaat en veilig. Moet dit met niemand deel nie.

verify_recovery_phrase.title: Verifieer herstelfrase
verify_recovery_phrase.body: Kom ons kyk of jy die frase korrek neergeskryf het. Kies die woorde in die regte volgorde.

backup_wallet.title: Back-up na 'n Stronghold lêer
backup_wallet.body: Voer jou wagwoord in om you beursie na 'n Stronghold lêer te rugsteun. Jou wagwoord word gebruik om die back-up te enkripteer.

recovery_phrase_saved.title: Rugsteun suksesvol
recovery_phrase_saved.body: Jy het jou beursie ge back-up na 'n Stronghold.

import.title: Voer 'n beursie in
import.body: As jy 'n herstelfrase of 'n Stronghold back-up het, kan jy dit hier invoer.

import_from_text.title: Herstel jou beursie met 'n herstelfrase of seed
import_from_text.body_1: 'N Herstelfrase is 24 woorde lank. Dit word gebruik om 'n bestaande Firefly beursie te herstel.
import_from_text.body_2: 'N seed bestaan uit 81 karakters. Dit word gebruik om van 'n ouer Trinity beursie te herstel.
import_from_text.body_3: Voer you seed of herstelfrase in

import_from_file.title: Herstel u beursie uit 'n back-up lêer
import_from_file.body: Voer 'n rugsteunlêer in om jou beursie te herstel. Back-up kan 'n Stronghold (.stronghold) of 'n Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx) wees.

import_backup_password.title: Herstel jou beursie vanaf 'n SeedVault of 'n Stronghold
import_backup_password.body_1: Sleutel asb jou back-up wagwoord in.
import_backup_password.body_2: Dit is die wagwoord wat jy ingestel het toe jy die back-up gemaak het.

import_success.title: Jy het jou back-up suksesvol herwin
import_success.body: Jy kan nou jou nuwe beursie instel.

migrate.title: Migreer jou fondse
migrate.body_1: Hierdie is 'n outomatiese proses om jou fondse na jou nuwe beursie oor te dra. Ons sal kyk na spandeerde adresse wat jou sekuriteit verswak.
migrate.body_2: Dit kan 'n rukkie neem. Moenie jou toestel tydens die migrasie afskakel nie.

generalSettings.title: Algemene instellings
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Sekuriteit
security.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

advancedSettings.title: Gevorderde instellings
advancedSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

helpAndInfo.title: Help & Inligting
helpAndInfo.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

login.please_wait: Wag asseblief {time, plural, one {1 sekonde} other {# sekondes}}
login.incorrect_attempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 verkeerde poging} other {# verkeerde pogings}}

stronghold_backup.title: Stronghold Backup
stronghold_backup.weeks_ago: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weke}} ago

password.title: Wagwoord benodig
password.subtitle: Voer asseblief you beursie-wagwoord in om Stronghold te ontsluit

version.title: Huidige weergawe: {version}
version.up_to_date_description: Jy gebruik die nuutste en veiligste weergawe van Firefly.

backup.title: Laaste backup: {date}
backup.last_backup: Jy het laas 'n backup op {date} gemaak
backup.backup_description: Dit is belangrik om gereeld 'n backup te maak om te verseker dat jy 'n afskrif van jou rekeninge en transaksiegeskiedenis het.
backup.backup_warning: As jy jou backup en herstelfrase verloor, verloor jy toegang tot jou fondse.
backup.not_backed_up_description: Jy het nie jou Stronghold gebackup nie

delete_account.title: Verwyder {name}?
delete_account.body: You will permanently lose your transaction history and maybe something else as well.
delete_account.type_password: Voer die wagwoord van jou beursie in om te bevestig.
delete_account.error_body_1: Om 'n rekening te verwyder, moet jy 0 balans hê.
delete_account.error_body_2: Jy het tans {balance} op hierdie rekening oor. Skuif hierdie fondse na 'n ander rekening en probeer weer.
delete_account.error_body_3: You cannot delete this account, you must have at least one.

node.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this node?

deleteProfile.title: Vee profiel uit
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

general.upload_seedvault_or_stronghold: Voer 'n Stronghold of SeedVault lêer in
general.no_accounts: Jy het geen rekeninge nie, skep asseblief een.

dates.days_ago: {time, plural, one {# dag} other {# dae}} ago
dates.weeks_ago: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weke}} ago
dates.months_ago: {time, plural, one {# maand} other {# maande}} ago
dates.years_ago: {time, plural, one {# jaar} other {# jare}} ago

notifications.failed: Uitgaande {{value}} vanaf {{account}} het nie oordra nie
notifications.downloading_update: Besig om bywerking af te laai
notifications.update_error: 'N Fout het tydens die opdatering voorgekom. Probeer asseblief weer
notifications.minutes_remaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minuut oor} other {# minute oor}}

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.reasonWord: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your account name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest account before creating a new one.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this account.
account.duplicate: 'n Rekening met hierdie naam bestaan alreeds.

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.

node.https: HTTPS is required. Set up a developer profile to use unsecured HTTP connections.
node.unsynced: The node you are trying to add is not synced.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
